Social And Cultural Activities: Social Work Campaigns for prohibition and rejection of non-vegetarian food among common people; works for inculcation of Indian cultural ethos with inspiration Nirvikar path
Favourite Pastime and Recreation: Watching television and going on long drives
Educational Qualifications: B.Sc. Educated at Government Science College, Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh
Other Information: University representative, Govt. Science College, Jabalpur, 1978-79; Member, Jabalpur Timber Association, 1992-93; Election organiser, Bargi Legislative Assembly Constituency, 1994 and 1999; President, BJP(Rural), Jabalpur, since 2001
